root.name: LEGO Stunt Rally
root.description: LEGO Stunt Rally is a racing game for the Game Boy Color, Playstation, and PC. In the story, you take control of Lego characters to battle other Lego racers on the race tracks to try to take the title of champion from Racer X. You move place to place in different environment themes (snow, jungle, city) to fight a final racing boss. If beaten, you unlock the racing boss to race with. The game also features a track creator for the quick race and multiplayer modes. You use parts unlocked from the story mode to create these tracks.
